topics.topic_html: Convey, renown, hazard, concise, broader, specimen, pose, ambitious, prevalent, corrode, implications,

| Drain         | নিঃসৃত করা        |
| Coarse        | মোটা               |
| Dilute        | পাতলা করা           |
| Leftover      | অবশিষ্ট           |
| Beneath       | নীচে               |
| Denser        | ঘনত্বপূর্ণ        |

| Word | Bangla Meaning | Synonyms | Example |
|---|---|---|---|
| pervade | পরিব্যাপ্ত করা | spread, penetrate, diffuse | The smell of freshly baked bread *pervaded* the kitchen. |
| invade | আক্রমণ করা | attack, enter forcibly, overrun | The enemy troops *invaded* the country. |
| native | স্থানীয় | indigenous, born, natural | The *native* people of Australia are the Aborigines. |
| predator | প্রধানশিকারী | hunter, carnivore, beast of prey | The lion is a *predator* that hunts other animals. |
| prey | শিকার | victim, target, quarry | The hawk swooped down and seized its *prey*. |
| indigenous | স্বদেশী | native, aboriginal, endemic | The koala is an *indigenous* animal of Australia. |
| overexploitation | অতিরিক্ত শোষণ | overuse, overharvesting, depletion | *Overexploitation* of natural resources can lead to environmental damage. |
| sanctuary | অভয়ারণ্য | refuge, shelter, reserve | The bird *sanctuary* provides a safe haven for many species. |
| legislation | আইন প্রণয়ন | lawmaking, law, statute | New *legislation* was passed to protect endangered species. |
| enforce | প্রয়োগ করা | implement, execute, carry out | The police are responsible for *enforcing* the law. |
| captive | বন্দী | prisoner, confined, enslaved | The tiger was kept in *captive* in a zoo. |
| extinction | বিলুপ্তি | disappearance, annihilation, eradication | Many species are facing the threat of *extinction*. |
| sustainable | টেকসই | enduring, maintainable, viable | We need to find *sustainable* solutions to environmental problems. |
| assert | দাবি করা | state firmly, declare, maintain | She *asserted* her innocence. |
| emphasize | জোর দেওয়া | stress, highlight, underline | He *emphasized* the importance of education. |
| assess | মূল্যায়ন করা | evaluate, judge, rate | The teacher will *assess* your work. |
| resource | সম্পদ | supply, asset, fund | Natural *resources* are essential for human survival. |
| renewable | পুনর্নবীকরণযোগ্য | sustainable, recyclable, reusable | Solar energy is a *renewable* resource. |
| non-renewable | অপুনর্নবীকরণযোগ্য | exhaustible, finite, limited | Fossil fuels are *non-renewable* resources. |
| replenish | পূরণ করা | refill, restock, replenish | We need to *replenish* our water supply. |
| pest | কীটপতঙ্গ | vermin, insect, bug | Cockroaches are a common household *pest*. |
| minimize | হ্রাস করা | reduce, lessen, curtail | We must *minimize* our carbon footprint. |
| integrate | একীভূত করা | combine, merge, unite | It's important to *integrate* people from different cultures. |
| depletion | হ্রাস | reduction, decrease, exhaustion | The *depletion* of the ozone layer is a serious problem. |
| addressing | সম্বোধন করা | tackling, dealing with, confronting | We need to *address* the issue of climate change. |
| intensify | তীব্র করা | increase, strengthen, heighten | The storm *intensified* as it moved inland. |
| immense | অপরিসীম | vast, huge, enormous | The universe is *immense*. |
| depletion | হ্রাস | reduction, decrease, exhaustion | The *depletion* of the ozone layer is a serious problem. |
| issues | বিষয় | problems, matters, concerns | Environmental *issues* are becoming increasingly important. |
| leads to | পরিণত হয় | results in, causes, brings about | Deforestation *leads to* soil erosion. |
| scarcity | অভাব | shortage, deficiency, lack | A *scarcity* of water can lead to drought. |
| emission | নিঃসরণ | discharge, release, outflow | Greenhouse gas *emissions* are contributing to climate change. |
| emerge | উদ্ভব হওয়া | appear, arise, come out | New technologies are constantly *emerging*. |
| amplify | প্রবল করা | increase, magnify, strengthen | The microphone *amplified* his voice. |
| expand | প্রসারিত করা | enlarge, extend, grow | The company plans to *expand* its operations. |
| municipal | পৌরসভা | city, town, urban | The *municipal* government is responsible for providing public services. |
| hazardous | বিপজ্জনক | dangerous, risky, perilous | Exposure to *hazardous* chemicals can cause health problems. |
| disposal | নিষ্পত্তি | elimination, discarding, getting rid of | Proper waste *disposal* is important for environmental protection. |
| increase | বৃদ্ধি | rise, growth, expansion | The population of the city has *increased* dramatically. |
| exacerbate | তীব্র করা | worsen, aggravate, intensify | Stress can *exacerbate* health problems. |
| infrastructure | অবকাঠামো | framework, foundation, system | The country needs to invest in its *infrastructure*. |
| high per capita | প্রতি ব্যক্তি উচ্চ | per person high, high per individual | The country has a *high per capita* income. |
| precedence | অগ্রাধিকার | priority, preference, precedence | Environmental concerns should take *precedence* over economic interests. |
| mitigate | হ্রাস করা | lessen, reduce, alleviate | We need to *mitigate* the effects of climate change. |
| campaign | অভিযান | crusade, drive, movement | The environmental *campaign* raised awareness about pollution. |
| autocompete | স্বয়ংসম্পূর্ণ প্রতিযোগিতা | self-competition, internal competition, intra-competition | The company's *autocompete* strategy led to increased innovation. |
| breed | প্রজনন করা | reproduce, propagate, multiply | Many animals *breed* in the spring. |
| feed | খাওয়ানো | nourish, supply, provide | Farmers *feed* their livestock. |
| utilize | ব্যবহার করা | use, employ, exploit | We need to *utilize* our resources wisely. |
| gain | লাভ করা | acquire, obtain, earn | She *gained* a lot of experience working abroad. |
| compromise | আপোষ করা | settle, yield, concede | We need to find a *compromise* that satisfies everyone. |
| volatile | অস্থির | unstable, changeable, fluctuating | The stock market is very *volatile*. |
| encompass | অন্তর্ভুক্ত করা | include, comprise, cover | The course *encompasses* a wide range of topics. |
| sub-discipline | উপ-শাখা | branch, subdivision, offshoot | Environmental science is a *sub-discipline* of biology. |
| numerous | অসংখ্য | many, countless, innumerable | There are *numerous* reasons why we should protect the environment. |
| enormous | বিশাল | huge, vast, immense | The *enormous* size of the whale amazed us. |
| approximate | আনুমানিক | estimated, rough, ballpark | The *approximate* cost of the project is $1 million. |
| hypothesize | অনুমান করা | postulate, theorize, conjecture | Scientists *hypothesize* that life may exist on other planets. |
| postulate | অনুমান করা | hypothesize, propose, suggest | Einstein *postulated* the theory of relativity. |
| realm | ক্ষেত্র | domain, sphere, field | The *realm* of science is constantly expanding. |
| habitat | বাসস্থান | home, environment, dwelling | The rainforest is the natural *habitat* of many endangered species. |
| homestead | বাড়ি | home, house, residence | The family's *homestead* was passed down through generations. |
| exploit | শোষণ করা | take advantage of, utilize, make use of | We should not *exploit* natural resources. |
| contagious | সংক্রামক | infectious, communicable, catching | The flu is a *contagious* disease. |
| cited | উদ্ধৃত | quoted, mentioned, referred to | The study *cited* numerous examples of environmental damage. |
| known | পরিচিত | familiar, recognized, understood | The Amazon rainforest is *known* for its biodiversity. |
| acquainted | পরিচিত | familiar, aware, informed | I am *acquainted* with the problem. |
| contemporaries | সমসাময়িক | peers, colleagues, associates | The artist exhibited his work alongside his *contemporaries*. |
| respectively | যথাক্রমে | in that order, severally, individually | The first and second prizes went to John and Mary, *respectively*. |
| disprove | অস্বীকার করা | refute, contradict, deny | Scientists have *disproved* many ancient beliefs.
